title: Are you ready for sex?
creator_credit: Sheri Gillette Espar, Henry Mayer and Mayer Espar Productions
brief_description: Through dramatization and student discussions, questions concerning sexual responsibility, inter-personal communication, peer group pressure, sexual maturity, personal values, sexual intercourse, the use of contraceptives and sexual abstinence are examined. The discussion has an American cultural bias. Suitable for Mid-Upper Secondary students.
